---
title: "Lesson 11 Checklist"
---

By the end of this lesson, you should be able to:

* create a system of linear equations from information provided in a written format
* solve a system of two linear equations with two unknowns using graphs
* solve a system of two linear equations with two unknowns using substitution
* interpret the solution to a system of equations
* solve a system of equations obtained using trendlines
* solve a non-linear system of two equations using a graph
